pkgmetadata.longdescription: Consistency in the Analytic Hierarchy Process // An integrated set of functions for building, analyzing, and visualizing Analytic Hierarchy Process (AHP) models, designed to support structured decision-making in consultancy, policy analysis, and research (Bose 2022 doi:10.1002/mcda.1784; Bose 2023 doi:10.1002/mcda.1821). In addition to tools for assessing and improving the consistency of pairwise comparison matrices (PCMs), the package supports full-hierarchy weight computation, intuitive tree-based visualization, sensitivity analysis, along with convenient PCM generation from user preferences.
